comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16964?focusedCommentId=17561558) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
CC `[~icexelloss]`

TSAN only runs on our nightly tests so these errors are often missed during CI / PR.  Could you take a look?  You should be able to build and run the test locally with TSAN by providing `ARROW_USE_TSAN=ON` as part of the cmake command to generate the cache.  You will need to be using clang.
